author: Stacy Liberatore
description: Sea sponges that provide food and shelter to other marine animals are losing their cells and dying. This is due to extreme temperatures warming oceans and causes stress for the sponges.
title: New Zealand sea sponges are 'dying by the millions' due to climate change
content:
On land, heatwaves can be deadly for humans and wildlife and can devastate crops and forests.

author: CBC News
description: Students with the Dalhousie Space Systems Lab have constructed the first satellite made in Nova Scotia and it will soon be launched into space — an Atlantic Canadian first.
title: Tiny satellite built in Nova Scotia ready for 1st mission to space
content:
